name: National Brokers Alliance
overview: At National Brokers Alliance (NBA), we keep you updated on which annuity, life insurance and long-term care policies offer the best solutions to meet individual needs. As a national wholesaler of annuities, life insurance and long-term care insurance, we can match clients with Producers in their area. This is mutually beneficial for the client and the independent insurance producer. Our high level concepts range from simple to complex, but can have a major impact on wealth accumulation, distribution, retention or transfer. We can also provide resources to help you implement some of these innovative techniques.
